reasoning: TINU syndrome is a rare systemic condition characterized by concurrent tubulointerstitial nephritis and uveitis. Estimated incidence ~0.3 per 100k based on case series and epidemiological studies showing it accounts for 0.3-1% of acute tubulointerstitial nephritis cases and similar proportion of uveitis cases. Limited prospective data.
source: Estimated from case reports and nephrouveitis syndrome epidemiology
